Container.Name: plex-releases-summary
Container.Overview: A lightweight container that fetches recently added media from your Plex server via Tautulli and sends summaries to Discord. Minimal configuration required - just 2 fields (Tautulli URL and API key). Smart defaults: checks last 7 days, runs weekly on Sundays at 4 PM. Supports scheduled (daemon) or one-shot mode. Discord notifications optional. For complete documentation, see https://github.com/thomas-lg/plex-releases-summary/blob/main/README.md - For configuration guide, see https://github.com/thomas-lg/plex-releases-summary/blob/main/docs/CONFIGURATION.md
Container.Requires: Minimal setup: Tautulli v2.1.0+ running and accessible with API enabled. On first run, config.yml is auto-created from template with environment variable references. Just set the required variables below (Tautulli URL and API key). For advanced configuration options and troubleshooting, see https://github.com/thomas-lg/plex-releases-summary/blob/main/docs/CONFIGURATION.md

Config.Name: AppData Config Path
Config.Description: Container config path. On first run, config.yml is auto-created. Edit this file only for advanced customization beyond environment variables.

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: Tautulli server URL (required). Example: http://tautulli:8181 or http://192.168.1.100:8181

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: Tautulli API key (required). Find in Tautulli: Settings → Web Interface → API. Can be direct value or file path (e.g., /run/secrets/tautulli_api_key).

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Optional: Discord webhook URL or file path. Leave empty to disable notifications (default).

Config.Name: Run Once
Config.Description: Optional: One-shot mode ('true') or scheduled daemon ('false', default).

Config.Name: CRON Schedule
Config.Description: Optional: CRON schedule (default: '0 16 * * SUN' = Sunday 4 PM). Runs in container timezone (set TZ variable to change from UTC). Use crontab.guru for help.

Config.Name: Days Back
Config.Description: Optional: Days to look back for releases (default: 7).

Config.Name: Initial Batch Size
Config.Description: Optional: Override adaptive batch size for Tautulli API (1-10000). Leave empty for automatic sizing based on days_back.

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: Optional: Plex server URL for generating media links (default: https://app.plex.tv).

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Optional: Timezone for CRON schedule (default: UTC). Examples: America/New_York, Europe/Paris, Asia/Tokyo. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Optional: Logging level - DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR (default: INFO).

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (default: 99 for Unraid 'nobody' user). Match this to your host user ID.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (default: 100 for Unraid 'users' group). Match this to your host group ID.
